00044     var $rules = array();

00049     function rules() {}

00057     function up ($rulenumber)
00058     {
00059         $rules = array();
00060         for ($i = '0'; $i < count($this->rules); $i++) {
00061             if ($i == ($rulenumber - '1')) {
00062                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i+'1'];
00063                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i];
00064             } else if ($i != $rulenumber) {
00065                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i];
00066             }
00067         }
00068         $this->rules = $rules;
00069     }
00070 
00077     function down ($rulenumber)
00078     {
00079         $rules = array();
00080         for ($i = '0'; $i < count($this->rules); $i++) {
00081             if ($i == $rulenumber) {
00082                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i+'1'];
00083                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i];
00084             } else if ($i != ($rulenumber + '1')) {
00085                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i];
00086             }
00087         }
00088         $this->rules = $rules;
00089     }
00090 
00097     function del ($rulenumber)
00098     {
00099         $rules = array();
00100         for ($i = '0'; $i < count($this->rules); $i++) {
00101             if ($i != $rulenumber) {
00102                 $rules[] = $this->rules[$i];
00103             }
00104         }
00105         $this->rules = $rules;
00106     }
00107 
00114     function addRule ($rulenumber = false)
00115     {
00116         if (!$rulenumber || ($rulenumber > count($this->rules))) {
00117             $this->rules[] = array();
00118             return (count($this->rules) - '1');
00119         } else {
00120             for ($i = '0'; $i < count($this->rules); $i++) {
00121                 if ($i == $rulenumber) {
00122                     $_new_rulebase[] = array();
00123                 }
00124                 $_new_rulebase[] = $this->rules[$i];
00125             }
00126             $this->rules = $_new_rulebase;
00127             return $rulenumber;
00128         }
00129     }
00130 
00137     function addComment ($comment = false)
00138     {
00139         if ($comment) {
00140             $_data['type'] = "comment";
00141             $_data['comment'] = $comment;
00142             $this->rules[] = $_data;
00143         }
00144     }

00154     function addEntity ($type, $rulenumber, $data)
00155     {
00156         if (!isset($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type])) {
00157             $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type] = $data;
00158         } else if (!is_array($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type])) {
00159             $_temp = $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type];
00160             unset($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type]);
00161             $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type][] = $_temp;
00162             $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type][] = $data;
00163             $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type] = array_unique ($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type]);
00164         } else {
00165             $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type][] = $data;
00166             $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type] = array_unique ($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type]);
00167         }
00168     }
00169 
00178     function delEntity ($type, $rulenumber, $data)
00179     {
00180         if (is_array($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type])) {
00181             foreach ($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type] as $entity) {
00182                 if ($entity != $data) {
00183                     $_new_data[] = $entity;
00184                 }
00185             }
00186             if (count($_new_data) == '1') {
00187                 $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type] = $_new_data['0'];
00188             } else {
00189                 $this->rules[$rulenumber][$type] = $_new_data;
00190             }
00191         } else {
00192             unset($this->rules[$rulenumber][$type]);
00193         }
00194     }

00203     function parseString ($rules, $i)
00204     {
00205       $i++;
00206       if ($rules[$i] == "\"") {
00207         $data = $rules[++$i];
00208         while ($rules[++$i] != "\"") {
00209           $data .= " ". $rules[$i];
00210         }
00211       } else {
00212         $data = $rules[$i];
00213       }
00214       return Array($data, $i);
00215     }
00216 
00217   function parseItem ($rules, $i, $delimiter_pre = "{", $delimiter_post = "}")
00218   {
00219     $i++;
00220     //
00221     // Check if the rule is negated (! { $item1, $item2})
00222     // If it is, replace with ({ !$item1, !$item2})
00223     //
00224     if ($rules[$i] == "!") {
00225           $ii = ++$i; // Need a new iterator for this loop
00226         while (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[++$ii]) != $delimiter_post) {
00227             if (($rules[$ii] != $delimiter_pre) and ($rules[$ii] != $delimiter_post)) {
00228               if ($rules[$ii]{0} == "!") {
00229                 //Delete Double negations
00230                 $rules[$ii] = substr($rules[$ii], 1);
00231               } else {
00232                 $rules[$ii] = "!". $rules[$ii];
00233               }
00234         }
00235         }
00236     }
00237         if (($rules[$i] == $delimiter_pre)) {
00238           while (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[++$i]) != $delimiter_post) {
00239             if (($rules[$i] != $delimiter_pre) and ($rules[$i] != $delimiter_post)) {
00240           if($rules[$i] == "\("){
00241               while($rules[++$i] != "\)"){
00242                   $data2[] = $rules[$i];
00243               }
00244               $data[] = "(" . join(" ", $data2) . ")";
00245               unset($data2);                     
00246           }
00247           else{                  
00248               $data[] = $rules[$i];
00249           }
00250             }
00251           }
00252         } else {
00253           //
00254           // Check if we have for instance ($ext_if) that by now has been
00255           // translated to \( $ext_if \)
00256           //
00257           if ($rules[$i] == "\(") {
00258         while($rules[++$i] != "\)"){
00259             $data2[] = $rules[$i];
00260         }
00261         $data[] = "(" . join(" ", $data2) . ")";
00262         unset($data2);
00263           } else {
00264             $data = $rules[$i];
00265           }
00266         }
00267         return Array($data, $i);
00268   }
00269 
00270   function parsePortItem ($rules, $i)
00271   {
00272     $i++;
00273     //
00274     // Check if the rule is negated (! { $item1, $item2})
00275     // If it is, replace with ({ !$item1, !$item2})
00276     //
00277     if ($rules[$i] == "!") {
00278       $ii = ++$i; // Need a new iterator for this loop
00279         while (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[++$ii]) != "}") {
00280             if (($rules[$ii] != "{") and ($rules[$ii] != "}")) {
00281               if ($rules[$ii]{0} == "!") {
00282                 //Delete Double negations
00283                 $rules[$ii] = substr($rules[$ii], 1);
00284               } else {
00285                 $rules[$ii] = "!". $rules[$ii];
00286               }
00287         }
00288         }
00289     }
00290 
00291     if ($rules[$i] == "{") {
00292       while (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[++$i]) != "}") {
00293         $rules[$i] = preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[$i]);
00294         switch ($rules[$i]) {
00295         case "}":
00296             break;
00297         case "=":
00298             $data[] = $rules[++$i];
00299             break;
00300         case "!=":
00301         case "<":
00302         case "<=":
00303         case ">":
00304         case ">=":
00305             $data[] = $rules[$i]. " ". $rules[++$i];
00306             break;
00307         default:
00308             switch (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[$i+1])) {
00309             case "<>":
00310             case "><":
00311             case ":":
00312                 $data[] = $rules[$i]. " ". $rules[++$i]. " ". $rules[++$i];
00313                 break;
00314             default:
00315                 $data[] = $rules[$i];
00316                 break;
00317             }
00318             break;
00319         }
00320       }
00321     } else {
00322       switch ($rules[$i]) {
00323       case "=":
00324         $data = $rules[++$i];
00325         break;
00326       case "!=":
00327       case "<":
00328       case "<=":
00329       case ">":
00330       case ">=":
00331         $data = $rules[$i]. " ". $rules[++$i];
00332         break;
00333       default:
00334         switch (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[$i+1])) {
00335         case "<>":
00336         case "><":
00337         case ":":
00338             $data = $rules[$i]. " ". $rules[++$i]. " ". $rules[++$i];
00339             break;
00340         default:
00341             $data = $rules[$i];
00342             break;
00343         }
00344         break;
00345         }
00346     }
00347     return Array($data, $i);
00348   }

00357     function generateItem ($items, $heading)
00358     {
00359     if (is_array($items)) {
00360       return " ". trim($heading). " { ". join($items, " "). " }";
00361     } else {
00362       return " ". trim($heading). " ". $items;
00363     }
00364     }
